Title: Saahasam Swaasaga Saagipo
Actors: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Manjima Mohan, Baba Sehgal, Rakendu Mouli
Plot: When his sister's classmate, Leelaa, comes to spend the summer at his family home, a friendship is forged in few days and when our hero decides to take off on a road trip across the country...
